properties.entry: SELECT A.PLAYER_CODE , A.PLAYER_ID , A.PLAYER_HP , A.PLAYER_MAX_HP , A.PLAYER_SP , A.PLAYER_DP , A.PLAYER_GOLD , A.PLAYER_EXP , A.PLAYER_LEVEL , A.PLAY_TIME , A.PLAYER_LIVE_YN , A.STAGE1_CLEAR_YN , A.STAGE2_CLEAR_YN FROM PLAYER_INFO A WHERE A.PLAYER_ID = ? AND A.PLAYER_LIVE_YN = 'Y'
